channel.title: Change the autosave?
channel.description: How do you make it so your char files are saved like every second? but not tell you in your runserver.bat, im pimpscape based if it matters..[br][size=1]Posted on: April 13, 2007, 01:54:16 PM[/size][hr]Someone please help..

item.title: Change the autosave?
item.dc:creator: @samuraiblood2 samuraiblood2
item.description:
@samuraiblood2 wrote:

Search for the message in the runserver and change the println.
